posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked:
Hi guys, I am learning how to use tube convertor feature in Onshape, and when I press tube convertor, it does not turn to what I want, what was the mistake I make, how should I solve the question? This what I have image 1926×1258 160 KB This is what I want to have image 1057×542 44.2 KB

image 1926×1258 160 KB

image 1926×1258 160 KB

image 1057×542 44.2 KB

image 1057×542 44.2 KB

posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked: No, should I? I extruded them at the same time

posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked: Then do I have to make 2 sketches for the each box?

posts.name: diego
posts.cooked: No, do you have the extrude individual featurescript installed?

posts.name: diego
posts.cooked: If not, install the featurescripts mentioned here

posts.name: Roger
posts.cooked:
This solved my problem, I really appreciate that!!!

image 1931×1201 135 KB

image 1931×1201 135 KB

image 1931×1201 135 KB

If you have any more questions, there is a discord server linked at the bottom of the home page of frcdesign.org that you can join, you would probably be able to get your questions answered faster there.

posts.name: Calvin Selin
posts.cooked: basically, the tube Converter thinks of every single body as needing to become its own tube.  if you only have one body, it tries to make one tube out of it.
